PHRASE.LANG: This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "All In Award" for winning on a 5 to 1 or higher odds horse and betting all 20 coins. [#Legal]

Ce trophée est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. Il s'agit de la "All In Award" pour gagner sur un cheval 5 à 1 ou supérieur cotes et paris les 20 pièces de monnaie. [#Legal]
This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "All In Award" for winning on a 5 to 1 or higher odds horse and betting all 20 coins. [#Legal]
